tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I am overwhelmed by the treatment and services rendered by Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard. We have gone to many hospitals getting appointments from prominent doctors both in India and in abroad but all in vain. We came to know London Harley street clinic through one of my friends who also took treatment and blessed with two kids. We approached Dr Parimalam with previous reports. Dr Parimalam clearly said will go step by step. We followed the instructions given by both the doctors. Specific to mention that Dr Leonard before taking scan, Dr clearly explains the purposes and makes us to understand both positive and negative aspects. Both of them are approachable and they are trustworthy human beings. The IVF treatment and procedure was done by Dr Parimalam. We are blessed with a boy baby on March 8, 2024. We were longing and planning for a gift of child for almost 12 years. We thank Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard for their continuous treatment and support. Both of them are very cool and calm persons. The nurses and staff assistants are also very helpful and they behave politely. We highly recommend London Harley clinic to anyone. We are always indebted to Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard.

Have been consulting with Dr.Parimalam right from the initial stage all the way to delivery. Both Dr.Parimalam and Dr.Leonard are very friendly and professional. Dr. Leonard has been very patient and has been clearly explaining each and every phase during every scan process throughout my delivery. Dr. Parimalam encouraged me for normal delivery. She was always available via WhatsApp and calls for any clarification needed and guided us. I delivered a healthy baby boy via normal delivery.Thanks to Dr. Parimalam, Dr. Leonard and their staff team for making the birth journey comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an amazing experience with Dr. Parimalam throughout my pregnancy. She always explained every step in my pregnancy in detail. She answered all my questions everytime I had doubts. She had given her phone number and was reachable every time I wanted to ask her any doubts related to my pregnancy. She was very confident in her decisions and had proper reasoning for every decision she made. Dr Leonard was amazing as well. He explained what he was doing patiently during every scan. Overall it was a great experience. I would definitely recommended her for all pregnant woman.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wanted to express my gratitude towards Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard for providing the best pregnancy and delivery experience. As a 24 year old I was too scared during my final trimester . But having Dr Parimalam as my OBGYN, I had such a nice experience. My first pregnancy was a cake walk with their help. At around 28 weeks , we found my AFI level is below average and got to know there might be chances for preterm . But Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard handled it in a very calm and confident way and by gods grace I delivered my baby healthily at 38+ weeks. She is so friendly like we can call or ping her anytime for help.  Even post delivery she is following up with me asking for health updates of myself and my baby. I highly recommend Dr Parimalam ** *** *** ********* *** *** **** ******

review: I'm satisfied with Dr. Parimalam, who will diagnosis the actual problem facing by the patient and further treatment were excellent with scanning facility and caring nurses.
Doctor is really good and explain all the queries of the patient. She is really friendly with us.The wait time is little more but staff are helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I consulted with Dr Parimalam and Dr Leonard at London Harley clinic for my second pregnancy. I moved cities half way in my pregnancy and was worried about transitioning to a different gynaec. I dug deep and found Dr Parimalam through her rave reviews for her personal care to patients and thats exactly what i was looking for, after having a very disappointing experience in a big hospital for my first delivery where my gynaec didnt even turn up for the delivery and only consulted by phone! 

And i struck gold with Dr Parimalam! 
She is very caring, remembers details about you and gives you all the time in the world for all your questions and never rushes you even when the patient load is high. Same goes for Dr Leonard who was our ultrasonologist  and is absolutely best at the job. They make a great team, highly competent in their fields! I crossed 39 weeks and Dr Parimalam was all for completely normal progression of labor and was super supportive and encouraged me to stay put. I delivered my baby girl through vaginal delivery a few days before my due date with no intervention to augment labor. 

I would highly recommend them for anyone looking for a caring personal experience in this fast paced time where doctors dont have more than a few minutes to spare.

Dr.Parimalam mam and the Staffs in London Harley Street hospital are just superb ....I was very comfortable to share my problems with mam and she is very optimistic too.... Those who are scared of hospitals and treatments as  I was, just visit this hospital once...I m sure you won't be disappointed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My Twin pregnancy and Delivery was such a pleasant and beautiful experience because of Dr Parimalam who was always available on calls or text, she gave us our time and space to relish every moment, every scan and the delivery itself. . 

The scans here were especially memorable for us in this place with Dr Leo and Dr Parimalam working side by side and explaining everything to us in detail. 

Especially grateful for how they stood by us and immediately responded to an emergency where we though we almost lost our babies. She spoke to me patiently on the phone, and comforted me on the way to the clinic. And as soon as we got there and we could find the heart beat of both the babies, the couple genuinely rejoiced with us like they were our own family.  

So thankful for the care and support they have shown. Will always be grateful  üôè
